signature: void write(RTree<T, S>, OutputStream) throws IOException

enhanced_by.reason: The context of the RTree must be written before the tree itself to ensure proper deserialization.
Nodes must be written recursively after the context and root presence are established.
The read method performs the inverse operation of writing, making it a good candidate for asserting the correctness of the write method.
Both methods handle the serialization of data, making assertions about writeValue useful for verifying write.
